title: PilotEdit v9.7.0
description:
PilotEdit v9.7.0

PilotEdit 9.7.0 includes a fix for serial number verification.

PilotEdit is an amazing file editor capable of opening files larger than 400GB (40 billion lines).

1. The file size supported by PilotEdit is unlimited
2. Code collapse
3. Self-defined file types and key words high-lightening
4. HEX mode
5. Column mode
6. Endless undo/redo
7. Word wrap
8. Edit FTP files
9. Multiple-line find/replace
10. File comparison and merging
11. Self-defined string table
12. Regular expression
13. Script file
14. 256-bit AES encryption/decryption
15. File group/bookmark
16. Find/replace in multiple directories
17. Sort
18. Find/remove duplicate lines
19. Extract Strings
20. Save the selected files as new files with the old directory structure
21. Text Formatting
22. Edit SFTP files
23. Open very large files in quick mode.
24. Replace millions of strings in a huge file in quick mode
25. UNICODE files and DOS/UNIX files are fully supported by PilotEdit

Features: http://www.pilotedit.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=section&layout=blog&id=6&Itemid=54
Official Website: http://www.pilotedit.com/index.php
